js.JS_DELETE_ALL_RECYCLE_RECORD: Delete all records from Recycle Bin
js.JS_ACTIVATE_RECORD_DESC: Activating a record only changes the record's state without changing the rest of information. Are you sure you want to activate the record?
js.JS_DELETE_ALL_RECYCLE_RECORD_DESC: Verwijderen is permanent en onomkeerbaar. Weet u zeker dat je deze records wilt verwijderen?
